customer_header.name: Account page header
customer_header.note: These settings control the appearance of the header on customer / account pages when the overlay header option is enabled

popup_return.label: Time before the popup re-appears for the user

hide_price0_box_and_button.label: Hide cart button if product is $0

header__1.info: These options are relevant if you have disabled the header image overlay or on pages where no image overlay is present

show_free_shipping_minimum_amount.label: Show free shipping minimum amount
show_free_shipping_minimum_amount.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping). Note that the free shipping bar currently only works with the default currency of your store. If your store sells in multiple currencies, consider disabling this feature.

always_show_cart_related_collection.label: Show upsell products even if cart is empty

empty_cart_featured_collections__header.info: Add button links to suggested collections when cart is empty

favicon_image.label: Favicon image
favicon_image.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

align_height_of_product_images.label: Align height of product images
align_height_of_product_images.info: Sets a fixed height for different size product images so grid looks uniform

swatch_option_name.label: Swatch option names
swatch_option_name.info: List product options that should show as color swatches. Option titles must match exactly. Separate multiple options with commas (no spaces).

custom_color_swatches.label: Custom color swatches
custom_color_swatches.info: Add a comma-separated list of color names and corresponding [hex codes](https://htmlcolorcodes.com/color-picker/) to populate color swatches on your product pages and in collection/search filters.  Colors should be added in this format: White - #FFFFFF, Black - #000000, etc.

use_variant_image_for_grid_swatches.label: Use variant images for swatches
use_variant_image_for_grid_swatches.info: This option overrides custom swatch colors above on product pages and in the product grid

show_reviews_badge.label: Show reviews badge
show_reviews_badge.info: You need to install [Shopify's free Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app before enabling this option.

note.label: Note that cart and checkout totals will always show the currency code, and itemized, unit, and installment prices will not.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

use_featured_image.label: Use featured image as header background

link_list.label: Navigation
link_list.info: This navigation won't show dropdown items.

link_list.label: Menu
link_list.info: This navigation won't show dropdown items.

shipping_estimator_default_country.label: Default country
shipping_estimator_default_country.info: If a customer is logged in, their default shipping country will be selected.

grid.label: Collections per row
grid.info: Only applies to carousel and grid section styles

grid_mobile.label: Collections per row mobile
grid_mobile.info: Only applies to  grid section styles

image.label: Collection image
image.info: If no image is specified, the collection featured image will show

header__1.info: You only need to adjust these options if you've chosen "Group filtering" above

group_array.label: Type desired group order in a comma-separated list
group_array.info: List items must be identical to the tag prefixes used for filtering (no underscore), and have no spaces between commas (e.g. Brand,Product Type,Burn Time,Color)

title.label: Heading
title.info: Subscribers will be added to your “accepts marketing” [customer list.](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
low_inventory_threshold.info: Use this slider to show a low inventory urgency message if stock reaches the level you specify.  If you set this to 0, the product will simply show as in stock or out of stock regardless of inventory levels.

show_follow_on_shop.label: Show Follow on Shop
show_follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

header__3.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__4.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

title.label: Heading
title.info: Subscribers will be added to your “accepts marketing” [customer list.](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

enable_overlap_header.label: Enable image/video overlap
enable_overlap_header.info: Header elements and navigation will appear on top of supported sections

enable_header_fallback_image.label: Show header fallback image on product pages

header_fallback_image.label: Header fallback image
header_fallback_image.info: This image will appear on any page where no other image is specified. Only applies if 'Enable image/video overlap' option above is enabled

show_top_line_separator.label: Show line separator
show_top_line_separator.info: Only appies if 'Logo next to navigation' style is enabled above

alternate_logo.label: Alternate logo image
alternate_logo.info: Optional alternate logo for overlapped sections

show_search_filter.label: Enable categories drop-down
show_search_filter.info: You must fill in the Product Type field in your products to populate this.

search_popular_searches.label: Popular searches menu
search_popular_searches.info: This menu will populate a list of popular search terms

search_popular_products.label: Popular search collection
search_popular_products.info: The products in this collection will appear as popular products in search results

menu_item.label: Navigation item
menu_item.info: Enter the name of one of your main navigation links to make it a multi-column mega menu drop-down. [Learn more](https://support.milehighthemes.com/article/48-setting-up-header-navigation-options-and-mega-menus-video-tutorial).

header__images.info: Optionally add up to two images with text and links to your mega menu for display on desktop devices

menu_item.label: Navigation item
menu_item.info: Enter the name of one of your main navigation links to make it a vertical multi-column categories menu. [Learn more](https://support.milehighthemes.com/article/48-setting-up-header-navigation-options-and-mega-menus-video-tutorial).

header__1.info: Optionally add an image with text and link to your categories menu for display on desktop devices

collection_grid_display.label: Collection grid display
collection_grid_display.info: 'Fixed height images' option sets a fixed height for different size collection images so the grid look uniform

paragraph__1.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

background_image.label: Image
background_image.info: Displayed if the map isn’t loaded

removeBottomMargin.label: Remove bottom margin
removeBottomMargin.info: Section will sit flush on top of the footer if it is the last section on the page

removeBottomMargin.label: Remove bottom margin
removeBottomMargin.info: Section will sit flush on top of the footer if it is the last section on the page

use_stacked_layout.label: Enable stacked layout
use_stacked_layout.info: Will ignore heading, subheading and space between images

use_lightbox.label: Enlarge images on click
use_lightbox.info: Will ignore links and images will open in a popup instead

use_mobile_redability.label: Improve mobile readability
use_mobile_redability.info: Darkens images and uses white text on mobile devices

title.label: Heading
title.info: Subscribers will be added to your “accepts marketing” [customer list.](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

removeBottomMargin.label: Remove bottom margin
removeBottomMargin.info: Section will sit flush on top of the footer if it is the last section on the page

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who signup will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

show_product_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_product_recommendations.info: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

enabled_mobile_sticky_btns.label: Enable sticky cart buy buttons on mobile

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)
To display a rating, add a product rating app.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift cards
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allow buyers to send gift cards to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

low_inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
low_inventory_threshold.info: Use this slider to show a low inventory urgency message if stock reaches the level you specify.  If you set this to 0, the product will simply show as in stock or out of stock regardless of inventory levels.

search_layout.label: Sidebar layout
search_layout.info: Sidebar will only display if Storefront filtering is enabled in collection page settings

removeBottomMargin.label: Remove bottom margin
removeBottomMargin.info: Section will sit flush on top of the footer if it is the last section on the page

html5_video_url.label: MP4 video URL
html5_video_url.info: MP4 videos prefered for reliable auto-playback on mobile devices

html5_video_url.label: MP4 video URL
html5_video_url.info: MP4 videos preferred for reliable auto-playback on mobile devices
